author: China Insights
description:
One month after Yu Menglong’s death, the storm is only growing fiercer—Mango Excellent Media’s market value plunged by 4.8 billion RMB in a day, a vice president suddenly resigned, and China’s National Social Security Fund appeared on the shareholder list; tens of thousands of fans took to the streets demanding the truth, and 260,000 people worldwide have signed a petition. This is not an “accident,” but a stress test of red capital collapsing. Who is covering up? Who is panicking? Don’t miss the next drop—subscribe and enable the bell.
Welcome to China Insights — your window into the real China, beyond the veil.
With sharp analysis and a touch of dry humor, we dive into the social unrest, economic crises, censorship, faith suppression, and human rights challenges shaping China today.
We spotlight authentic Chinese culture, deliver timely and uncensored news, break down key economic trends, and explore shifting social dynamics — all while exposing the Chinese Communist Party’s complex
title: Yu Menglong Firestorm: Mango Crashes, Exec Quits, Fans Erupt
